players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us and eliminating them. I have reason to suspect Diana, but I need more evidence before making an accusation."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's sentiment. Let's work together to identify the mafia and keep our town safe. I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment, but let's remain vigilant."
Charlie: "I support Alice's suggestion to focus on identifying the mafia. I have no reason to suspect anyone at this moment, but let's all keep an open mind and share any concerns we may have."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide and I trust everyone in this town. Let's continue working together to identify the mafia among us and keep our town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
